page.title: 20THE REINDEER PUBLIC HOUSE
page.content: The{Reindeer Pub}is on the A449 north of Ombersley.It is a family pub offering a climbing frame and a slide and children are allowed inside the pub.Opening times are 11.00am to 2.30 pm and 6.00pm to 11.00pm. They have a wide range of drinks. The size of the pub itself is quite big.{Activities} consist of Dominoes, Fruit machines, TV, Crib and darts. There is a pigeon -racing club that meets weekly. There are local customers and coach parties. There are two bars. In the cellars there are a wide range of modern machinery. The cellars have to be very clean the{barrels}are run by elecric and gas pumps. There are different size barrels. The biggest one is 54-gallons and is called the hogshead, there is a 36-gallon and an 18-gallon called a killdekin and 9-gallon one called the firkin.{
